title: lovelife - Novoli
typeOfFood: Lacto, Italian, Salad bar, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers fresh juices, fruit smoothies, milkshakes, soups, bagels, salads with spelt, couscous, basmati, or brown rice salads, plus a salad bar to build-your-own salad. Jazz music played in the background. Free Wi-Fi and book exchange shelf.
